product_name: Nite Ize Steelie Dash Ball Mount
long_description: The Nite Ize Steelie Ball Mount offers incredible functionality in every vehicle you own. Use it to mount your phone and keep it at your fingertips. Compatible with Steelie Magnetic Sockets (sold separately). Each kit contains 1 Dash Ball, 1 primer pen and 1 cleaning pad.
short_description: The Nite Ize Steelie Ball Mount offers incredible functionality in every vehicle you own. Use it to mount your phone and keep it at your fingertips.
